author: WSJ Staff
title: Bon-Ton Assets Snapped Up by Liquidation Firms, Bondholders
text:
Bon-Ton Stores Inc. said late Tuesday a joint venture, including a group of the bankrupt retail chain’s bondholders, won an auction for the company’s assets.
Subject to approval from a bankruptcy court, two liquidation firms—Great American Group LLC and Tiger Capital Group LLC—and the holders of Bon-Ton’s second-lien secured notes will acquire the retailer’s inventory and certain other assets, Bon-Ton said in a news release. The company didn’t provide any financial details of the deal.
